hero.description: I am Sam, a 20-year-old Software Developer with a passion for creating digital solutions. I study at Saxion in Enschede in the Software Development program. In my free time, I am dedicated to both fitness and soccer because I believe that a healthy mind and a healthy body go hand in hand with my creative work.

softwareDevelopment.title: Software Development
softwareDevelopment.text: My days are filled with writing code and developing innovative digital solutions. During my work and studies, I engage in exciting projects in the world of software development.

fitness.title: Fitness
fitness.text: Outside of my programming work, you can often find me at the gym, where I work on my strength and fitness. Additionally, I'm frequently on the soccer field, where I play in a friendly team as the last man.

animals.title: Animals
animals.text: I'm a big animal lover myself. I have lived with animals my whole life, and currently, we have 3 dogs in our house.

campingcare.title: Software Developer at Camping Care
campingcare.text: I currently work at Camping.care in Denekamp, where I work with a small team on a PMS for campgrounds used throughout Europe.

cube.title: Internship at Cube B.V.
cube.text: I worked with the team on various projects, including the development of a website for easily generating cookie notifications.

telecats-conceptlisous.title: Shadowing days at Telecats B.V. and Conceptlisious
telecats-conceptlisous.text: During these shadowing days, I attended multiple SCRUM sessions and tested virtual reality games.

saxion.title: Saxion University of Applied Sciences
saxion.text: Currently, I am pursuing the Software Development program at Saxion in Enschede.

roc.title: ROC of Twente
roc.text: At ROC, I completed a 4-year program in Application & Media Development and obtained a diploma.

synologyPhotosReminder.title: Synology Photos Reminder
synologyPhotosReminder.text: This Node.js project searches for photos stored on a Synology NAS server. It finds photos taken on the current day, but a random number of years ago, and then sends them to your email.

rentACar.title: RentACar (Practice Exam)
rentACar.text: In this practice exam, we create a car rental website for Mr. Jansen. The company FastDevelopment develops software on commission. The car rental company Rent-a-Car has requested the development of a new web application.

calc4You.title: Calc4You
calc4You.text: For a school assignment, I collaborated in a SCRUM team to create a calculator application in .NET Core. This application also includes age verification for calculator usage.

gameFinder.title: GameFinder
gameFinder.text: During my internship at Cube B.V., I created an assignment (to learn the Vue.js framework) that allows you to find any game using filters through the IGDB API.
